description: Access Ultrahuman metrics to monitor sleep, recovery, steps, heart rate, HRV, temperature, glucose, and metabolic score. Get rich sleep summaries with efficiency, HR/HRV quick stats, and stage breakdowns, plus daylong step counts. Track daily trends to guide training, wellness decisions, and personalized coaching.

email.description: Email of the user whose data to access (e.g., user@example.com)

authorizationKey.description: Ultrahuman API Authorization key provided by Ultrahuman

capabilities.name: get-user-metrics
capabilities.description: Fetch Ultrahuman metrics for the configured user and a specific date. Returns sleep data, movement data, heart rate, HRV, temperature, steps, glucose, metabolic score, and more.

capabilities.name: get-sleep
capabilities.description: Fetch sleep data for the configured user on a specific date. Returns sleep summary, quick metrics (total sleep, efficiency, heart rate, HRV), and sleep stages breakdown.

capabilities.name: get-recovery
capabilities.description: Fetch recovery score for the configured user on a specific date.

capabilities.name: get-steps
capabilities.description: Fetch steps data for the configured user on a specific date. Returns step count values throughout the day and average steps.
